role_description: An Ansible role that installs shfmt on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [shfmt](https://github.com/mvdan/sh) is a shell parser, formatter, and interpreter with bash support that is written with [Go](https://gitlab.com/megabyte-labs/ansible-roles/go).
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs shfmt on nearly any platform.
